message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with sentence-based image description and grounded language understanding. It is also likely to belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) because it involves image annotation and localization of textual entity mentions in an image. Additionally, it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) because it presents a strong baseline for the task and discusses the limitations of current methods, which are both related to machine learning and AI. Finally, it could belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) because it discusses image-sentence retrieval as a related task.
